qualifications:
Job Overview
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Data Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining robust data pipelines and architectures that support our data-driven decision-making processes. This role requires a strong understanding of big data technologies and cloud-based solutions, particularly within the Azure ecosystem.

Duties
